availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Consisted of Trimble, Carroll, Gallatin, Owen, Grant, Pendleton, Bracken, Boone, Kenton, Campbell counties from 1861 to 1863. Represented by John W. Menzies from 1861 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Patrick Lewis, “Visualizing Unionism: Congressional Redistricting in 1861,”Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition blog, April 27, 2016, accessed December 26, 2019, https://civilwargovernors.org/visualizing-unionism-congressional-redistricting-in-1861/. “Congressional and Judicial District Maps, Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition, accessed December 26, 2019, http://discovery.civilwargovernors.org/congressional-and-judicial-district-maps.
